pages.text: A storage item that can hold an almost infinite number of items, similar to Dank Storage, but only for one item. There are significant differences:$(li)When empty, you can right-click to open a simple GUI to add an item.$(li)The StorageBox takes on the look of the item stored.

pages.title: Hot Keys
pages.text: $(li)Put in Storage Box or put in Storage Box from Container: Colon key (Default)$(li)Put out from Storage Box or put out from Storage Box and put in Container: Colon key(Default) + Shift$(li)Put out from Storage Box and drop: Colon key(Default) + Shift + Ctrl$(li)Switch Auto Collect: Colon key(Default) + Ctrl
